									</p><div class="TRS_Editor"><div class="TRS_PreAppend" style="overflow-x: hidden">
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">中华人民共和国</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2023</span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">年国民经济和社会发展统计公报</span></b><b><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[1]</font></span></sup></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 楷体">国家统计局</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 楷体">2024</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 楷体">年<span lang="EN-US">2</span>月<span lang="EN-US">29</span>日</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2023</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">年是全面贯彻党的二十大精神的开局之年，是三年新冠疫情防控转段后经济恢复发展的一年。面对复杂严峻的国际环境和艰巨繁重的国内改革发展稳定任务，在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下，各地区各部门坚持以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，全面贯彻落实党的二十大和二十届二中全会精神，按照党中央、国务院决策部署，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，着力推动高质量发展，全面深化改革开放，加大宏观调控力度，着力扩大内需、优化结构、提振信心、防范化解风险，国民经济回升向好，高质量发展扎实推进，现代化产业体系建设取得重要进展，科技创新实现新的突破，改革开放向纵深推进，安全发展基础巩固夯实，民生保障有力有效，社会大局和谐稳定，全面建设社会主义现代化国家迈出坚实步伐。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　一、综合</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　初步核算，全年国内生产总值</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[2]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1260582</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，第一产业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">89755</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；第二产业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">482589</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；第三产业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">688238</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。第一产业增加值占国内生产总值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，第二产业增加值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">38.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，第三产业增加值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">54.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。最终消费支出拉动国内生产总值增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个百分点，资本形成总额拉动国内生产总值增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.5</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个百分点，货物和服务净出口向下拉动国内生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.6</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个百分点。分季度看，一季度国内生产总值同比增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，二季度增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，三季度增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，四季度增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年人均国内生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">89358</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。国民总收入</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[3]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1251297</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全员劳动生产率</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[4]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">161615</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">/</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">人，比上年提高</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="532" height="296" alt="图片1" v:shapes="图片_x0020_1" oldsrc="W020240229295396294741.png" src="./W020240229295396294741.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US"><img width="530" height="296" alt="Screenshot at 2024-2-26 14-2-48" v:shapes="图片_x0020_2" oldsrc="W020240229295396456656.jpg" src="./W020240229295396456656.jpg"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US"><img width="531" height="297" alt="图片3" v:shapes="图片_x0020_3" oldsrc="W020240229295396454054.png" src="./W020240229295396454054.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国人口</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[5]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">140967</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，比上年末减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">208</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，其中城镇常住人口</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">93267</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。全年出生人口</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">902</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，出生率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.39</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">‰；死亡人口</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1110</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，死亡率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.87</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">‰；自然增长率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">-1.48</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">‰。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">表</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1</span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2023</span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">年年末人口数及其构成</span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国就业人员</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">74041</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，其中城镇就业人员</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">47032</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，占全国就业人员比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">63.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年城镇新增就业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[7]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1244</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，比上年多增</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">38</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。全年全国城镇调查失业率平均值为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。年末全国城镇调查失业率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国农民工</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[8]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">总量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">29753</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，外出农民工</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">17658</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；本地农民工</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12095</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末国家外汇储备</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">32380</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，比上年末增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1103</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元。全年人民币平均汇率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">美元兑</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.0467</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元人民币，比上年贬值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　新动能成长壮大。全年规模以上工业</span><sup><font size="2"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;">[11</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;">]</span></font></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">中，装备制造业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[12]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增加值比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占规模以上工业增加值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">33.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；高技术制造业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[13]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增加值增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占规模以上工业增加值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">15.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。新能源汽车产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">944.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">30.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；太阳能电池（光伏电池）产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">54.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；服务机器人产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">783.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万套，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">23.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3D</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">打印设备产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">278.9</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万台，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">36.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。规模以上服务业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[14]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">中，战略性新兴服务业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[15]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">企业营业收入比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。高技术产业投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[16]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，制造业技术改造投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[17]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。电子商务交易额</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[18]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">468273</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。网上零售额</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[19]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">154264</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年新设经营主体</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3273</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户，日均新设企业</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　城乡融合和区域协调发展步伐稳健。年末全国常住人口城镇化率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">66.16%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，比上年末提高</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.94</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个百分点。分区域看</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[20]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，全年东部地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">652084</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；中部地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">269898</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；西部地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">269325</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；东北地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">59624</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年京津冀地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">104442</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；长江经济带地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">584274</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；长江三角洲地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">305045</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。粤港澳大湾区建设、黄河流域生态保护和高质量发展等区域重大战略深入推进。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="540" height="316" alt="图片7" v:shapes="图片_x0020_7" oldsrc="W020240229295396764888.png" src="./W020240229295396764888.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　绿色低碳转型深入推进。全年全国万元国内生产总值二氧化碳排放</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[21]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">与上年持平。水电、核电、风电、太阳能发电等清洁能源发电量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">31906</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿千瓦时，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。在监测的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">339</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个地级及以上城市中，空气质量达标的城市占</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">59.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，未达标的城市占</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">40.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3641</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个国家地表水考核断面中，水质优良（Ⅰ～Ⅲ类）断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">89.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，Ⅳ类断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，劣Ⅴ类断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　二、农业</span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年棉花产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">562</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，比上年减产</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。油料产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3864</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，增产</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。糖料产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11504</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，增产</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。茶叶产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">355</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，增产</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年猪牛羊禽肉产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9641</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；牛肉产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">753</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；羊肉产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">531</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年水产品总产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7100</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，养殖产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5812</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；捕捞产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1288</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万吨，下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年木材产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11944</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万立方米，比上年下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年新建和改造提升高标准农田面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">574</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，新增高效节水灌溉面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">164</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　三、工业和建筑业</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年全部工业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">399103</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。规模以上工业增加值增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。在规模以上工业中，分经济类型看，国有控股企业增加值增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；股份制企业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，外商及港澳台商投资企业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；私营企业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。分门类看，采矿业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，制造业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，电力、热力、燃气及水生产和供应业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="531" height="296" alt="图片9" v:shapes="图片_x0020_9" oldsrc="W020240229295396921365.png" src="./W020240229295396921365.png"></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年规模以上工业中，农副食品加工业增加值比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，纺织业下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，化学原料和化学制品制造业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，非金属矿物制品业下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，专用设备制造业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，汽车制造业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，电气机械和器材制造业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，电力、热力生产和供应业增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[26]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，火电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">139032</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；水电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">42154</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；核电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5691</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；并网风电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">44134</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">20.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；并网太阳能发电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">60949</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">55.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年建筑业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">85691</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国具有资质等级的总承包和专业承包建筑业企业利润</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8326</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[27]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中国有控股企业</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4019</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　四、服务业</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年批发和零售业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">123072</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；交通运输、仓储和邮政业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">57820</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；住宿和餐饮业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">21024</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">14.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；金融业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">100677</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；房地产业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；信息传输、软件和信息技术服务业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">55194</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。规模以上服务业企业营业收入比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，利润总额增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">26.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="531" height="296" alt="图片11" v:shapes="图片_x0020_11" oldsrc="W020240229295397085167.png" src="./W020240229295397085167.png"></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年货物运输总量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[28]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">557</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。货物运输周转量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">247713</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨公里，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。港口完成货物吞吐量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">170</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中外贸货物吞吐量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">50</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。港口集装箱吞吐量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">31034</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万标准箱，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国民用汽车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">33618</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆（包括三轮汽车和低速货车</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">706</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆），比上年末增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1714</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，其中私人汽车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">29427</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1553</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆。民用轿车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18668</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">928</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，其中私人轿车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">17541</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">856</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆。</span></p>

font-family: 宋体">。邮政业完成邮政函件业务</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿件，包裹业务</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">基站</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">338</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个。全国电话用户总数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年限额以上单位商品零售额中，粮油、食品类零售额比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，饮料类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，烟酒类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，服装、鞋帽、针纺织品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，化妆品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，金银珠宝类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，日用品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，家用电器和音像器材类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，中西药品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，文化办公用品类下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，家具类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，通讯器材类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，石油及制品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，汽车类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，建筑及装潢材料类下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年实物商品网上零售额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">130174</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，按可比口径计算，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占社会消费品零售总额比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">27.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　六、固定资产投资</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年全社会固定资产投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">509708</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[37]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。固定资产投资（不含农户）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">503036</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。在固定资产投资（不含农户）中，分区域看</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[38]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，东部地区投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，中部地区投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，西部地区投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，东北地区投资下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　在固定资产投资（不含农户）中，第一产业投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10085</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；第二产业投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">162136</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；第三产业投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">330815</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。基础设施投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[39]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。社会领域投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[40]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。民间固定资产投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[41]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">253544</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；其中制造业民间投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，基础设施民间投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">14.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年全国各类棚户区改造开工</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">159</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万套，基本建成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">193</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万套；保障性租赁住房开工建设和筹集</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">213</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万套（间）。新开工改造城镇老旧小区</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.37</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个，涉及居民</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">897</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年对外非金融类直接投资额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9170</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">16.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，折</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1301</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，对共建“一带一路”国家非金融类直接投资额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2241</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">28.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，折</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">318</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">22.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年对外承包工程完成营业额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11339</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，折</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1609</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，对共建“一带一路”国家完成营业额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1321</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占对外承包工程完成营业额比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">82.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。对外劳务合作派出各类劳务人员</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">35</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　八、财政金融</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年全国一般公共预算收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">216784</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；其中税收收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">181129</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国一般公共预算支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">274574</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年新增减税降费及退税缓费超</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="531" height="296" alt="图片17" v:shapes="图片_x0020_17" oldsrc="W020240229295397547327.png" src="./W020240229295397547327.png"></span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 楷体">注：图中<span lang="EN-US">2019</span>年至<span lang="EN-US">2022</span>年数据为全国一般公共预算收入决算数，<span lang="EN-US">2023</span>年为执行数。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末广义货币供应量（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">M<sub>2</sub></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">292.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；狭义货币供应量（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">M<sub>1</sub></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">68.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；流通中货币（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">M<sub>0</sub></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年社会融资规模增量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[48]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">35.6</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，按可比口径计算，比上年多</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。年末社会融资规模存量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[49]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">378.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，按可比口径计算，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中对实体经济发放的人民币贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">235.5</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。年末全部金融机构本外币各项存款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">289.9</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，比年初增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">25.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，其中人民币各项存款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">284.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">25.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。全部金融机构本外币各项贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">242.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">22.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，其中人民币各项贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">237.6</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">22.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。人民币普惠小微贷款</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[50]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.6</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。人民币制造业中长期贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末主要农村金融机构（农村信用社、农村合作银行、农村商业银行）人民币贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">293584</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比年初增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">26363</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。全部金融机构人民币消费贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">579438</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10992</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。其中，住户短期消费贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">103541</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5078</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元；住户中长期消费贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">475897</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5914</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年沪深交易所</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">A</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">A</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">股</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">236</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">只，筹资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3418</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2286</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，其中科创板股票</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">67</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">只，筹资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1439</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元；沪深交易所</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">A</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">股再融资（包括公开增发、定向增发、配股、优先股、可转债转股）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7316</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2089</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。北京证券交易所公开发行股票</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">77</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">只，筹资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[52]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">146</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。全年各类主体通过沪深北交易所发行债券（包括公司债券、资产支持证券、国债、地方政府债券和政策性银行债券）筹资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">130677</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，其中沪深交易所共发行上市基础设施领域不动产投资信托基金（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年发行公司信用类债券</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[54]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.8</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，比上年增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年保险公司原保险保费收入</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[55]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">51247</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，寿险业务原保险保费收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">27646</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，健康险和意外伤害险业务原保险保费收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9993</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，财产险业务原保险保费收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13607</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。支付各类赔款及给付</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18883</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。其中，寿险业务给付</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5505</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，健康险和意外伤害险业务赔款及给付</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4207</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，财产险业务赔款</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9171</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。</span></p>

font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12114</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">14.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占居民人均消费支出比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">45.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。按常住地分，城镇居民人均消费支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">32994</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，扣除价格因素，实际增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；农村居民人均消费支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18175</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，扣除价格因素，实际增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国居民恩格尔系数为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">29.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中城镇为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">28.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，农村为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">32.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
