<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末国家外汇储备</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">32380</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，比上年末增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1103</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元。全年人民币平均汇率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">美元兑</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.0467</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元人民币，比上年贬值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
</span>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="532" height="297" alt="图片6" v:shapes="图片_x0020_6" oldsrc="W020240229295396767741.png" src="./W020240229295396767741.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　新动能成长壮大。全年规模以上工业</span><sup><font size="2"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;">[11</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;">]</span></font></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">中，装备制造业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[12]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增加值比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占规模以上工业增加值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">33.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；高技术制造业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[13]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增加值增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占规模以上工业增加值比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">15.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。新能源汽车产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">944.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">30.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；太阳能电池（光伏电池）产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">54.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；服务机器人产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">783.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万套，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">23.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3D</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">打印设备产量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">278.9</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万台，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">36.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。规模以上服务业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[14]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">中，战略性新兴服务业</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[15]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">企业营业收入比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。高技术产业投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[16]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，制造业技术改造投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[17]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。电子商务交易额</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[18]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">468273</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。网上零售额</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[19]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">154264</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年新设经营主体</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3273</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户，日均新设企业</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　城乡融合和区域协调发展步伐稳健。年末全国常住人口城镇化率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">66.16%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，比上年末提高</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.94</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个百分点。分区域看</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[20]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，全年东部地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">652084</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；中部地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">269898</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；西部地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">269325</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；东北地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">59624</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年京津冀地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">104442</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；长江经济带地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">584274</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；长江三角洲地区生产总值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">305045</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。粤港澳大湾区建设、黄河流域生态保护和高质量发展等区域重大战略深入推进。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="540" height="316" alt="图片7" v:shapes="图片_x0020_7" oldsrc="W020240229295396764888.png" src="./W020240229295396764888.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　绿色低碳转型深入推进。全年全国万元国内生产总值二氧化碳排放</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[21]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">与上年持平。水电、核电、风电、太阳能发电等清洁能源发电量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">31906</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿千瓦时，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。在监测的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">339</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个地级及以上城市中，空气质量达标的城市占</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">59.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，未达标的城市占</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">40.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3641</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个国家地表水考核断面中，水质优良（Ⅰ～Ⅲ类）断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">89.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，Ⅳ类断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，Ⅴ类断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，劣Ⅴ类断面比例为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　二、农业</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年粮食种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11897</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，比上年增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">64</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷。其中，稻谷种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2895</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">50</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷；小麦种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2363</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷；玉米种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4422</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">115</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷；大豆种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1047</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">23</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷。棉花种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">279</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">21</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷。油料种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1392</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">78</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷。糖料种植面积</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">142</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷，减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万公顷。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国发电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">291965</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[26]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，火电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">139032</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；水电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">42154</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；核电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5691</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；并网风电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">44134</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">20.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；并网太阳能发电装机容量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">60949</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万千瓦，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">55.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年建筑业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">85691</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国具有资质等级的总承包和专业承包建筑业企业利润</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8326</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[27]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中国有控股企业</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4019</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年批发和零售业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">123072</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；住宿和餐饮业增加值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">21024</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年货物运输总量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[28]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">557</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。货物运输周转量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">247713</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨公里，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。港口完成货物吞吐量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">170</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中外贸货物吞吐量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">50</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿吨，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。港口集装箱吞吐量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">31034</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万标准箱，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国民用汽车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">33618</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆（包括三轮汽车和低速货车</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">706</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆），比上年末增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1714</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，其中私人汽车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">29427</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1553</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆。民用轿车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18668</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">928</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，其中私人轿车保有量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">17541</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">856</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万辆。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年完成邮政行业寄递业务总量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[29]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1625</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿件，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">16.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。邮政业完成邮政函件业务</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿件，包裹业务</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿件，快递业务量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1320.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿件，快递业务收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12074</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。全年完成电信业务总量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[30]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18327</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">16.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。年末移动电话基站数</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[31]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1162</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个，其中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4G</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">基站</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">629</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5G</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">基站</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">338</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个。全国电话用户总数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">189992</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户，其中移动电话用户</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">172660</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户。移动电话普及率为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">122.5</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">部</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">/</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">百人。固定互联网宽带接入用户</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[32]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">63631</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户，比上年末增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4666</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户，其中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">100M</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">速率及以上的宽带接入用户</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[33]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">60136</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4756</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万户。蜂窝物联网终端用户</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[34]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">23.32</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿户，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.88</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿户。互联网上网人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.92</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿人，其中手机上网人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.91</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。按消费类型分，商品零售额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">418605</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；餐饮收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">52890</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">20.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。服务零售额</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[36]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">20.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="540" height="308" alt="图片14" v:shapes="图片_x0020_14" oldsrc="W020240229295397231685.png" src="./W020240229295397231685.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年限额以上单位商品零售额中，粮油、食品类零售额比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，饮料类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，烟酒类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，服装、鞋帽、针纺织品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，化妆品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，金银珠宝类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，日用品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，家用电器和音像器材类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，中西药品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，文化办公用品类下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，家具类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，通讯器材类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，石油及制品类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，汽车类增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，建筑及装潢材料类下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年实物商品网上零售额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">130174</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，按可比口径计算，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占社会消费品零售总额比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">27.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　六、固定资产投资</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年全社会固定资产投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">509708</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[37]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。固定资产投资（不含农户）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">503036</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。在固定资产投资（不含农户）中，分区域看</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[38]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，东部地区投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，中部地区投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，西部地区投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，东北地区投资下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　在固定资产投资（不含农户）中，第一产业投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10085</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；第二产业投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">162136</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；第三产业投资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">330815</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。基础设施投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[39]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.9%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。社会领域投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[40]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。民间固定资产投资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[41]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">253544</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；其中制造业民间投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，基础设施民间投资增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">14.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年对外非金融类直接投资额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9170</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">16.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，折</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1301</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，对共建“一带一路”国家非金融类直接投资额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2241</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">28.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，折</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">318</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">22.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年对外承包工程完成营业额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11339</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，折</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1609</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，对共建“一带一路”国家完成营业额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1321</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿美元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占对外承包工程完成营业额比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">82.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。对外劳务合作派出各类劳务人员</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">35</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　八、财政金融</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年全国一般公共预算收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">216784</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；其中税收收入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">181129</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国一般公共预算支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">274574</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年新增减税降费及退税缓费超</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="531" height="296" alt="图片17" v:shapes="图片_x0020_17" oldsrc="W020240229295397547327.png" src="./W020240229295397547327.png"></span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 楷体">注：图中<span lang="EN-US">2019</span>年至<span lang="EN-US">2022</span>年数据为全国一般公共预算收入决算数，<span lang="EN-US">2023</span>年为执行数。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末广义货币供应量（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">M<sub>2</sub></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">292.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.7%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；狭义货币供应量（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">M<sub>1</sub></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">68.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；流通中货币（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">M<sub>0</sub></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年社会融资规模增量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[48]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">35.6</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，按可比口径计算，比上年多</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。年末社会融资规模存量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[49]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">378.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，按可比口径计算，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中对实体经济发放的人民币贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">235.5</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。年末全部金融机构本外币各项存款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">289.9</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，比年初增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">25.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，其中人民币各项存款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">22.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，其中人民币各项贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">237.6</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">22.7</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。人民币普惠小微贷款</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[50]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末主要农村金融机构（农村信用社、农村合作银行、农村商业银行）人民币贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">293584</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比年初增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">26363</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。全部金融机构人民币消费贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">579438</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10992</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。其中，住户短期消费贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">103541</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5078</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元；住户中长期消费贷款余额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">475897</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5914</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年沪深交易所</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">A</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">股累计筹资</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[51]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">10734</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">A</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">股</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">236</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">只，筹资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3418</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2286</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，其中科创板股票</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">67</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">只，筹资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1439</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元；沪深交易所</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">A</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">股再融资（包括公开增发、定向增发、配股、优先股、可转债转股）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7316</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2089</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。北京证券交易所公开发行股票</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">146</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。全年各类主体通过沪深北交易所发行债券（包括公司债券、资产支持证券、国债、地方政府债券和政策性银行债券）筹资</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">130677</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，其中沪深交易所共发行上市基础设施领域不动产投资信托基金（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年发行公司信用类债券</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[54]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">13.8</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元，比上年增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">0.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万亿元。</span></p>

font-family: 宋体">元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，扣除价格因素，实际增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。其中，人均服务性消费支出</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[59]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">12114</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">14.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占居民人均消费支出比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">45.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。按常住地分，城镇居民人均消费支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">32994</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，扣除价格因素，实际增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">；农村居民人均消费支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18175</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">元，增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，扣除价格因素，实际增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.2%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全国居民恩格尔系数为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">29.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中城镇为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">28.8%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，农村为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">32.4%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="531" height="299" alt="图片18" v:shapes="图片_x0020_18" oldsrc="W020240229295397707668.png" src="./W020240229295397707668.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312"><img width="532" height="296" alt="图片19" v:shapes="图片_x0020_19" oldsrc="W020240229295397707233.png" src="./W020240229295397707233.png"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国参加城镇职工基本养老保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">52121</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，比上年末增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1766</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。参加城乡居民基本养老保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">54522</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，减少</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">430</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。参加基本医疗保险人数</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[60]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">133387</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，其中参加职工基本医疗保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">37094</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，参加城乡居民基本医疗保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">96293</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。参加失业保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">24373</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">566</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。领取失业保险金人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">352</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。参加工伤保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">30170</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1054</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。参加生育保险人数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">24907</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。年末全国共有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">664</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人享受城市最低生活保障，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">3399</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人享受农村最低生活保障，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">435</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人享受农村特困人员</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[61]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">救助供养，全年临时救助</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[62]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">742</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人次。全年领取国家定期抚恤金、定期生活补助金的退役军人和其他优抚对象</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">834</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万人。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国共有各类提供住宿的民政服务机构</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个，其中养老机构</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">4.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个，儿童福利和救助保护机构</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">971</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个。民政服务床位</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[63]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">846.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万张，其中养老服务床位</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">820.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万张，儿童福利和救助保护机构床位</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.8</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万张。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　十、科学技术和教育</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年研究与试验发展（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">R&amp;D</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">）经费支出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">33278</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">8.1%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，与国内生产总值之比为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2.64%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，其中基础研究经费</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2212</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">9.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">，占</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">R&amp;D</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">经费支出比重为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">6.65%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。国家自然科学基金共资助</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">5.25</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万个项目。截至年末，纳入新序列管理的国家工程研究中心</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">207</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个，国家企业技术中心</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1798</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">家。国家科技成果转化引导基金累计设立</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">36</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">只子基金，资金总规模</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">624</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元。国家级科技企业孵化器</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[64]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1606</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">家，国家备案众创空间</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[65]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2376</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">家。全年授予发明专利权</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">92.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万件，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">15.3%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">PCT</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">专利申请受理量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[66]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">7.4</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万件。截至年末，有效发明专利</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">499.1</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万件，比上年末增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">18.5%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。每万人口高价值发明专利拥有量</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[67]</font></span></sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">11.8</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">件。全年商标注册</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">438.3</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万件，比上年下降</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">29.0%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。全年共签订技术合同</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">95</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万项，技术合同成交金额</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">61476</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">亿元，比上年增长</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">28.6%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。我国公民具备科学素质</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[68]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">的比例达到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">14.14%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年成功完成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">66</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">次宇航发射。天舟六号、神舟十六号、神舟十七号任务相继实施，中国空间站进入应用与发展阶段。全球首枚液氧甲烷火箭朱雀二号遥二运载火箭成功发射。量子计算原型机九章三号成功构建。全超导托卡马克核聚变实验装置实现稳态高约束模式等离子体运行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">403</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">秒。全球首座第四代核电站高温气冷堆示范工程投入商业运行。全球首台</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">16</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">兆瓦海上风电机组并网发电。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">C919</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">大型客机正式投入商业运营。首艘国产大型邮轮完成试航。奋斗者号载人潜水器完成极限深潜。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国共有国家质检中心</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">877</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">家。全国现有产品质量、体系和服务认证机构</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1242</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">个，累计完成对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">102</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">万家企业的认证。全年制定、修订国家标准</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">2902</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">项，其中新制定</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1708</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">项。全年制造业产品质量合格率</span><sup><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><font size="2">[69]</font></span></sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">93.65%</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">。</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　全年研究生教育招生</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">130.2</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; <p class="MsoNormal"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　十一、文化旅游、卫生健康和体育</span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 宋体">　　年末全国文化和旅游部门所属艺术表演团体</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;">1893</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;
